data.meta_description: How to watch the De Graafschap vs FC Volendam live stream video. üèÜ Predictions, H2H, statistics and live score. Eerste Divisie 11/08/2024.
data.text:
üìè Form Guide

De Graafschap

DWDLLD

De Graafschap go into this game following on from a 2-2 Eerste Divisie Play-offs draw against ADO Den Haag.

For De Graafschap, the goalscorers were Ralf Seuntjens (67') and Jeffry Fortes (74'). Alex Schalk (22', 36') was the scorer for ADO Den Haag.

It has been seldom in recent times that De Graafschap have kept a clean sheet. The reality is that De Graafschap have been scored against in 5 of their previous 6 games, giving up 10 goals in the process. That pattern won‚Äôt necessarily be continued into this game, of course.

FC Volendam

WLLLLL üîª

After being beaten in their last game against Go Ahead Eagles in Eredivisie competition, FC Volendam and their fans will hope to get a better result this time.

In that match, FC Volendam had 46% possession and 14 shots on goal with 4 on target. The only player on the scoresheet for FC Volendam was Luke Le Roux (45'). For their opponents, Go Ahead Eagles had 21 shots at goal with 11 on target. Philippe Rommens (16') and Enric Llansana (88') scored for Go Ahead Eagles.

The numbers tell their own story, and FC Volendam have been scored against in 6 of their last 6 games, seeing opposing sides hit 20 goals in all. At the back, FC Volendam have been far from perfect.

ü§úü§õ Head to head

Looking at their most recent head to head clashes going back to 23/08/2019 shows us that De Graafschap have won 2 of these games and FC Volendam 3, with the number of drawn matches being 1.

Those games weren‚Äôt short on goals, either, with 28 in all at an average of 4.67 goals per match.

The last league fixture between these sides was Eerste Divisie match day 34 on 08/04/2022 which finished with the scoreline of FC Volendam 3-1 De Graafschap.

In that match, FC Volendam managed 41% possession and 11 shots at goal with 4 on target. The scorers were Robert M√ºhren (13'), Daryl van Mieghem (54') and Koen Blommestijn (95').

De Graafschap had 13 attempts on goal with 5 of them on target. Mees Kaandorp (23') scored.

The match was refereed by Martin van den Kerkhof.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Team News: De Graafschap

Availability isn‚Äôt a big problem, with just the lone fitness concern for the De Graafschap manager Jan Vreman to be concerned with thanks to an otherwise robust group of players. Simon Colyn (Cruciate ligament surgery) misses out.

üì∞ Team News: FC Volendam

Thanks to a largely available group of players, there is only the sole fitness worry for the FC Volendam boss Rick Kruys to contend with. Robin Maulun (unknown injury) won‚Äôt be playing here.

‚ö° Prediction

In our view, De Graafschap will probably dominate possession and create several successful chances.

Conversely, FC Volendam won‚Äôt find it easy to score a goal of their own although we do reckon that they could well end up scoring as well.

Our selection here is for a pretty comfortable 3-1 winning score for De Graafschap at the conclusion of the game.

Our expert partners are tipping over 1.5 goals for this match. Check out their VIP predictions here.

Victor Martins, 14:06 11/08/2024

Odds correct at time of publishing. All odds subject to change.
